alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:38PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Talladega, eastern Shelby and northwestern Coosa Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 538 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westover, or near Chelsea, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Chelsea, Childersburg, Columbiana, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Weogufka, Stewartville, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, Oak Grove, Bon Air, Winterboro, Strickland Crossroads, Fayetteville, Highland Lakes, Fowler Lake, Sycamore and Mount Laurel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
